name: Space Adventure! (helfy18)
description:
Space Adventure 2D Shooter!

  • The modifications I made from the tutorial are
  • Modified script to increase lives
  • Created 3 unique levels
  • Added lives to UI
  • added ability to spawn enemies only if player is near
  • Made it so some levels can respawn at place of death (with 4 seconds invincibility)
  • edited script to mute music on death
  • added type of movement where user is propelled along x axis
  • added extra life every 1000 points
  • redesigned all menus
  • sped up music at one life
  • added dynamic speed so that the spawners spawn more frequently when score is high

Created by Nathan Helfrich

With Assets from Brian Winn
